Macpeters: Fine Art

Visionary Psychedelic Blacklight Paintings

I often work with a mixture of airbrush and brush paint, and I'll start with base (not blacklight/uv reactive) colours, moving onto neon once I have the basic structure in place. Orbs and crystals are an ongoing theme for me these days.

I've been working on cartoons, recently, if you are interested in checking them out.
